Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watching her sister leave, Luna stops herself from calling Lucia back.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '(Lucia... just needs more time.)', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Similarly betrayed by humans, Lucia should feel the same hatred as Luna. She would not have passed the filtering otherwise.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "(Perhaps she's sympathizing with the Constructs, who are also betrayed?)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna could always tell what Lucia was thinking from her expression, but ever since her cathartic cry that night in the rain, Lucia has seemingly vented all her emotions.'}
{3: "After that, Lucia has been nothing but indifferent. Luna has not seen any trace of sentiments on Lucia's face for a while."}
{2: '???', 3: 'Should we follow her, Miss Luna?'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A familiar voice pulls Luna away from her contemplations. Roland and Gabriel approach her from the shadow.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "That's not necessary. Lucia is more than capable of handling those Babylonian Constructs, even if she is being merciful.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Not to mention that I always know how she's doing with my connection to her through the Ascension-Network.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'If she wants to take a walk by herself, she can take a walk by herself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Do you have something to report?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: "We have not found that Ascendant's trail yet. We have widened our search, but we have not discovered any clue that points us to him.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna is not too surprised by this result. He would not be the "Swindler" if he could be found so easily.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "On the other hand, we've learned something regarding Lucia.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'This has caught Luna by surprise. She turns to look at Roland, her gaze slightly fluttered.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'A few Babylonian defectors talked to us. "Gray Raven was almost wiped out in the last mission. Lucia, the only survivor, is back on Babylonia and receiving treatment."', 4: '1'}
{3: "Shock, comprehension, anger... Luna's golden eyes reveal a series of conflicting emotions before calming down again."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "They wouldn't let Lucia go, would they? Even if she isn't the original one.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Should we tell her?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Will telling her sister convince her to join their side? Luna is uncertain about it for the first time.'}
{3: 'All Luna has ever wanted is to be with her sister, but does Lucia feel the same now?'}
{3: 'Is Luna forcing Lucia to do something she is unwilling to do? Is that why there is this gulf between them right now?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Roland, Gabriel, how do you feel about Lucia becoming an Ascendant?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Luna's sudden question does not catch the two Ascendants off guard."}
{3: 'Gabriel answers without hesitation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Based on the data we recorded during our pursuit, I can conclude that she is a rather exceptional combatant amongst the Constructs we have encountered.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'She is simply unaccustomed to the utilization of the Ascension-Network. Given that she has passed the filtering, her mastery of the network is but a matter of time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Once she can fully harness the Ascension-Network, she will certainly become a massive boon to your plan, Miss Luna.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'She is someone you have chosen, Miss Luna. Your will is the will of the Ascension-Network. We abide by your decision.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Unlike Gabriel's candor, Roland takes his time to think without offering an answer."}
{3: 'Luna does not press him. She just watches him quietly.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'To the Ascnet...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland first takes a look at Gabriel before turning to Luna and continuing.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I think the most important thing is that Lucia didn't decline your invitation, Luna.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'I believe that Lucia\'s involvement must be crucial to achieving your "goal."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "It's going to take time and a good catalyst for her to realize that.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'That is what I just said. Is this your conclusion after thinking for so long?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "C'mon. I put a lot of thought into how to word it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '"Great minds think alike," don\'t they? We should be happy that we agree on this.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hearing what Roland said, Luna turns toward where Lucia departed.'}
{3: 'She gives her order after a while.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Keep searching for that Ascendant. We need to find out who sent him, at the very least.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "As for what you mentioned, Roland, we'll decide after Lucia returns.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel and Roland', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Raaargh!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The damaged Corrupted does not resist. A giant mechanical hand crushes it into pieces.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Gabriel retrieves its memory chip from its shattered body, starting to read the data stored inside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "There's no reason to be this cruel, is there? It's your people!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'It is a Corrupted who did not pass the filtering. It is nothing like me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Do you consider those feeble Constructs your "people"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'What a tough question.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Roland keeps smiling, not agreeing or disagreeing with Gabriel.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'So? Found anything related to that Ascendant?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Gabriel takes the memory chip out for his reader and throws it into the pile of metal scraps on the ground.'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Nothing new. It did not see the Ascendant who contacted the humans. We should move on to the next area.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "How about a short break, hm? I'm not you. I get tired.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "And don't you think Luna is a little bit too obsessed with this Ascendant? That can't be good, right? Luna draws enough attention as it is.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Babylonia is also searching for that Ascendant in secret. Now's not the time to confront them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: "The will of the agent is the will of the Ascension-Network. Are you doubting Miss Luna's decision?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I'll let you know that I'm really quite loyal, milord. But to do my job well, I need to understand my boss better.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: "Put your loyalty into action, then. It is such a human vice to pledge one's devotion in words only.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Now you're making me all worried. Does Luna care so much about that Ascendant because she wants to fire me and replace me with him?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Roland speaks with an exaggerated expression of concern. Gabriel does not pay him too much attention, being used to his jokes.'}

{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'There is indeed something special about this Ascendant. As the first Ascendant to connect to a human, his existence alone is worth studying. It is understandable that Miss Luna would want to capture him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Do you really think that's the reason?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Roland chuckles.'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Miss Luna may have other concerns, but we have no need to speculate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Because Miss Luna needs him, we will take him. If Miss Luna needs to destroy him, we will terminate him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Even if he is an Ascendant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'For Miss Luna?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'For Miss Luna and the Ascension-Network.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Well, then. I'll leave the other area to you to contribute to the great will of the Ascnet.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Where are you going?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Don't forget that I'm also looking for qualified candidates for the filtering as well.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I've been eyeing a few people. Now's the time to reel them in.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I mean, I'll appreciate it if you want to do my job for me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'I told you it is not necessary to lengthen the process of the filtering with your additional operations.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Bring your candidates to Miss Luna, and the Ascension-Network will pass its judgment.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Your games are pointless.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Sigh. You don't have to be so mean. I'm only doing this to find the truly worthy ones.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'With your silly arrangements?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'I prefer to call them tests.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'I hope they work. Other agents have started making moves as well. We will need more companions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I didn't expect you to be so guarded with the other agents.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Only those with absolute power can shape the new world to their likings.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Once humanity is wiped from this earth, the different Ascendant groups will clash.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'I am not guarded. On the contrary, I look forward to that day when other agents reveal their power and will to the Ascension-Network.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'That will be... gospel!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "So you agree with what I'm doing?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'I have always supported increasing our number.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'I merely hope you are taking your time to do something useful instead of doing something entertaining to you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Relax. I have a feeling that I'm going to catch something big this time.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Roland looks toward the distant horizon.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'I wonder what kind of show will they put on?', 4: '2'}
